tasks.task: Move pigs to trailer before rainy weather.
subtasks: Check ground conditions to determine pigs can't be moved outdoors.
Confirm harvest date is approaching (week from tomorrow).
Transfer pigs from outdoor area to trailer.
Add straw to trailer for pigs' comfort.
Ensure pigs have food and water in trailer.

tasks.task: Prepare for rain by relocating pigs.
subtasks: Ensure pigs are sheltered in trailer during rainy weather.
Monitor pigs' access to pond during relocation.

tasks.task: Address comfort measures for relocating pigs.
subtasks: Assess current living conditions of pigs (90% time indoors).
Verify pigs are used to trailer environment.
